text:
Yevgeny Ivanovich Shaposhnikov (; 3 February 1942 – 8 December 2020) was a Soviet and Russian military leader and politician. He was born in Rostov Oblast, Soviet Union. Shaposhnikov was Minister of Defence between 1991 to 1992.
Shaposhnikov died on 8 December 2020 in Moscow from COVID-19 at the age of 78.
